mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBERS (M_ID, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_NUMBER, PHONE, EMAIL, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PWD) VALUES (MEMBERS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{member_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{member_number, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{member_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{member_pwd, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT m.M_ID, m.MEMBER_ID, m.MEMBER_PWD, m.MEMBER_NAME FROM MEMBERS m WHERE m.MEMBER_ID = #{member_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
